allData.occupation: 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡 𝐈𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫 & 𝐀𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐝 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 | 𝐀𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐀𝐈, 𝐗𝐑 & 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 | 𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐮𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲

positions.title: Visiting Professorship - School of Artificial Intelligence
positions.description:
• Develop innovative curriculum to bridge the gap between traditional education and Industry 4.0/5.0 technologies.
• Collaborate with industry experts to integrate real-world applications into the classroom.
• Implement hands-on projects to enhance students' practical skills and prepare them for the workforce.

positions.title: Honorary Professor
positions.description:
As an Honorary Professor at the Wenzhou Institute of Technology's Department of "Intelligent Device Manufacturing and Control," my role is at the intersection of academia and the forefront of technological innovation. I specialize in the practical application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Generative AI in intelligent device manufacturing, emphasizing the transformative potential of these technologies in shaping the future of the industry. My work also extends into the realm of Extended Reality (XR), from Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR) to the burgeoning possibilities within the Metaverse.

By integrating these cutting-edge technologies into the curriculum and research projects, I am committed to preparing the next generation of engineers and innovators for the complexities of tomorrow’s manufacturing challenges. My focus on bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and real-world applications aims to foster an environment of creativity, problem-solving, and innovation. Through this, I contribute to shaping a future where the boundaries of manufacturing and digital realities converge, creating new paradigms for how we interact with, and produce, the technological marvels of the future.
positions.companyName: Wenzhou Institute of Technology - Department of "Intelligent Device Manufacturing and Control"

positions.title: Digital Training & Learning Innovator, XR and AI Specialist
positions.description:
After a fulfilling 20-year journey in Bavaria, I have relocated to North Rhine-Westphalia to continue my passion for spearheading digital training, learning, and knowledge initiatives. As a Neo-Generalist, I'm currently building my local network and immersing myself in the vibrant community here. My focus remains on leading innovations in Extended Reality (from VR to AR), Metaverse, AI, and GenAI, while intertwining these domains with Industry 4.0 and 5.0 concepts, all steered towards Sustainability.

In 2024, I will be ready to embark on new professional challenges, bringing fresh ideas and deep experience to create impactful solutions in the realm of digital education and sustainable technological advancements.

positions.title: Advisory Board Member
positions.description: As an Advisory Board Member for the Frankfurt Institute for Transformation, Innovation, and Management (FITI), I bring a wealth of expertise and experience to the forefront of driving transformation and fostering innovation within organizations. At FITI, we are dedicated to researching, developing, and implementing cutting-edge strategies that enable businesses to navigate the complexities of digital transformation and change management effectively. My role involves providing strategic insights, guiding research directions, and ensuring that FITI's initiatives are aligned with the latest industry trends and needs. With a strong focus on interdisciplinary approaches and practical solutions, I am committed to contributing to the Institute's mission of shaping future-ready organizations through innovation, leadership, and sustainable management practices.

company.name: Frankfurter Institut für Technologie und Innovation e.V.

positions.companyName: Frankfurter Institut für Technologie und Innovation e.V.

positions.title: 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗦𝗰𝗼𝘂𝘁 & 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗿
positions.description:
🌍 𝗚𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗧𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝗰𝗼𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 of "Smart" Learning Solutions as well as their adaptation and introduction
- Scouting and evaluation of new Hardware and Software solutions for Training, Learning / Knowledge - from the Idea to the Implementation, through the creation of the content, to the customer's learning experience

🤝 𝗖𝗼𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 with 🎓educational institutions and use of 💸 funding projects

💡 𝗖𝗼𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 of trade fairs / congresses / lecture activities

🌐 𝗘𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 / 𝗜𝗻𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘃𝗲 in global / local networks

🌏 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 into the 𝗔𝗣𝗔𝗖 region with an adapted portfolio
- Use and dissemination of the Additive Minds Academy offers
- Development of the external learning market in the APAC region
- Evaluation and cooperation with local B2B / B2C platforms in the region

allData.headline: 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡 𝐈𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫 & 𝐀𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐝 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 | 𝐀𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐀𝐈, 𝐗𝐑 & 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 | 𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐮𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲
allData.summary:
With 30+ years of experience in the realm of immersive learning, training, and knowledge, I am a disruptive innovator and an award-winning tech expert. I specialize in driving digital transformation across various industries, crafting efficient and future-proof ecosystems with AI, XR, and Metaverse technologies. 

As a Technology Scout & Expansion Manager, I scout and evaluate new hardware and software solutions for learning and knowledge, from the idea to the implementation, and adapt and introduce them to the global market. I also collaborate with educational institutions and leverage funding projects, coordinate trade fairs and congresses, and establish and involve in local and global networks. My unwavering passion lies in spearheading sustainable growth and consistently pushing the boundaries of industry standards.
allData.jobTitle: Visiting Professorship - School of Artificial Intelligence
